remarks: Value of the group operation in a quotient group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)
statement:
qusgrp.h $e |- H = ( G /s ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
qusadd.v $e |- V = ( Base ` G ) $.
qusadd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
qusadd.a $e |- .+b = ( +g ` H ) $.
qusadd $p |- ( ( S e. ( NrmSGrp ` G ) /\ X e. V /\ Y e. V ) -> ( [ X ] ( G ~QG S ) .+b [ Y ] ( G ~QG S ) ) = [ ( X .+ Y ) ] ( G ~QG S ) ) $.
